meanings: always, all the time, the whole time

vlive.korean: 늘 이런 식으로 일하십니까? Do you always work like this? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 벽과 벽 사이 [가두리횟집] EP07
vlive.english: Do you always work like this?

'늘 그자리에 상'? "Always There Award"? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : SHINee 0525
이렇게 이렇게 늘... I'm always like this... 듣기 View video ONG SEONG WU : 위로 탄생 1주년!!

examples.korean: The letter was written in her usual acerbic style. 발음듣기 편지는 그녀가 늘 쓰는 신랄한 어투로 쓰여 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The letter was written in her usual acerbic style. 발음

examples.korean: All the usual local notables were there. 발음듣기 늘 보는 지역 유지들 모두가 거기 와 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All the usual local notables were there. 발음

examples.korean: He was always getting into scraps at school. 발음듣기 그는 학교 다닐 때 늘 싸움을 벌였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was always getting into scraps at school. 발음

examples.korean: Vitamin deficiency in the diet can cause illness. 발음듣기 (늘 섭취하는) 음식에 비타민이 부족하면 병을 유발할 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Vitamin deficiency in the diet can cause illness. 발음

examples.korean: The government was limping along in its usual way. 발음듣기 정부는 늘 그렇듯 느릿느릿 움직이고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government was limping along in its usual way. 발음
